Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
functionality
<programming> Waffle for "{features}" or "function". The capabilities or behaviours of a program, part of a program, or system, seen as the sum of its {features}. Roughly, "the things it can do". Generally used in a comparative sense, e.g. "The latest update adds some useful functionality".
(1997-07-14)
functionality n : capable of serving a purpose well; "software with greater functionality"
